input_text:
Job Title: Graphic Designer Production

Location: St Paul, MN

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Art/Creative, Marketing

Description:
Scanlan International, Inc. has an exciting opportunity to join our company as a Graphic Designer. This position is based out of our corporate office south of downtown St. Paul, MN. We welcome an in office work environment Monday - Friday. Scanlan is a family owned medical device company specializing in the highest quality surgical instruments since 1921. 
Being a member of the Marcom team, you will wear a lot of hats in this position and be responsible for the development and ongoing maintenance of the art supporting product packaging materials. In addition, this position will assist with the printed literature and sales support materials, including our catalogs, brochures, mailers and other promotional materials. 
Position Responsibilities / Essential Functions:
45% Label packaging and developmentDevelopment and updating of art supporting product packaging materials.Layout, design, and processing of product IFU’s (instructions for use) for various medical products.Development, editing and processing labels for box, Pouch, and secondary labelingDesigning and updating custom EZ Tag labels based on customer requests.
45% Layout and design of print and digital Design printed literature and sales support materials - including corporate catalogs, brochures, mailers, and other promotional materials.Production of marketing graphics for social media, exhibit displays, special promotions, advertising, and general marketing support.Editing of digital photos to support marketing programs.
10% Miscellaneous tasksMaintain and update storage of data – primary and backup/redundancy systems.Maintaining/Updating hardware and software to keep systems current and functioning.Report and communicate to Sr. Director of Marketing Communications with the review programs, status updates, prioritization of production, deadlines, new programs and objectives

QUALIFICATIONS:Education:High school diploma required. Degree in Graphic Design / Interactive Design would be preferred.
Experience:5+ years of experience in design & graphic production – label/packaging design, print and pre-press production.Strong working knowledge of fundamental design tools, including but not limited to: Adobe Creative Suite (Illustrator, Photoshop, InDesign, and Acrobat)
Skills:Demonstrate skills as a creative conceptual thinker and problem solverExcellent computer skills in a Microsoft Windows environment.Effective oral and written communication.Excellent organizational skills.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

output_json.title: Graphic Designer Production
output_json.summary: Join Scanlan International, Inc. as a Graphic Designer in St. Paul, MN.
optional_skills: Strong working knowledge of fundamental design tools
Adobe Creative Suite (Illustrator, Photoshop, InDesign, and Acrobat)
soft_skills: Demonstrate skills as a creative conceptual thinker and problem solver

Assist with printed literature and sales support materials
Design and update custom EZ Tag labels
Design printed literature and sales support materials
Maintain and update storage of data
Report and communicate with Sr. Director of Marketing Communications
output_json.company_information: Scanlan International, Inc. is a family-owned medical device company specializing in the highest quality surgical instruments since 1921.
